newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egypt ups Giza 45 cotton export price a centilibre.
newsitem.headline: Egypt ups Giza 45 cotton export price a centilibre.

text.p: Egyptian companies raised the price of their Giza 45 cotton export variety one centilibre (U.S. cents per pound) for the week beginning on Sunday but kept prices for the remaining eight varieties steady.

The Alexandria Cotton Exporters Association, which coordinates exports by 11 state owned firms and seven private sector ones, set the Giza 45 price at between 225.00 and 195.00 centilibres from 224.00 and 194.00 centilibres.
The association said the prices for the nine varieties are valid until midnight (2100 GMT) on Sept 28.
The price ranges, all in centilibres, for the nine varities are (last week's prices in brackets):
FG/EX FG+1/4 FG FG-1/4 G/FG G+3/8 G+1/4
Note: FG/EX = fully good/excellent, G/FG = good/fully good
